body: Curriculum Materials       Fourth Grade Curriculum (contains teacher's guide, pre-site materials, on-site materials, post-site materials and evaluation form). If you would like more information on the educational program of Pu'ukohola Heiau National Historic Site or how you can incorporate your National Parks into your students' learning, please contact a Park Ranger at (808) 882-7218 Ext. 1011 or by Email.
